page.title: 05HOUSING IN TREMEIRCHION
page.content: A study of 35 households in the village of Tremeirchion was carried out by the children of the village school.One question asked the type of dwelling in the village.The results are as follows:-8of these dwellings were bungalows,8 were houses,1 was terraced,6 were farms,and one was a chapel house.Of the houses and bungalows,7were detached and 9 were semi-detached.4 of the dwellings studied were between 0-10 years old, 16 were 10-50 years old,3 were 50-100 years old and 12 were over 100years old.One question asked how many people live at this address?The results are as follows:-4 households had only one member;15 households had 2 members;3 households had 3 members;6 households had 4 members;4households had 5 members;1 household had 6 members and 2 households had 7 members.
